entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain or snow. Low zero with temperature rising to plus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this evening then changing to rain after midnight. Risk of freezing rain late this evening and after midnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southeast 40 gusting to 60 near midnight then becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 before morning. Low zero with temperature rising to plus 5 by morning. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of rain or drizzle. Temperature steady near 6.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending near noon then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of drizzle or showers. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Amount 2 mm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light near noon. Temperature steady near 6. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Saturday 1 April 2023
